title: Advanced Data Science Curriculum Utilizing Blended Problem-Solving Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistics, programming (Python/R), and foundational data analysis concepts
context.additional_context: In a blended learning environment using digital devices, this program emphasizes real-data-driven projects aligned with office/administrative professionals' job relevance.

learning_goals: They develop the ability to systematically solve complex analytical problems using real business data
They independently perform the entire process of data visualization, machine learning model building, and result interpretation through team-based collaboration

Learners can perform three or more data preprocessing steps (handling missing values, outlier removal, variable transformation) on real datasets (e.g., Kaggle, public data) using Jupyter Notebook or RStudio, and write a visualization and statistical analysis report in Markdown/PDF format (minimum 5 pages).

resources: Cloud Platform for Data Analysis (Google Colab/AWS SageMaker)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
